credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Friends of Wallcoverings Funds
title: Sidewall sample
description: Scalloped stripe with attached border; stripe composed of graduated scallops draped to reveal female figures in 18th century costume; attached border contains three female figures dressed in same manner. Printed in three shades of grey, three shades of blue, gold and ochre.
name: Sidewall sample
